trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Boston
There were no other sightings in Boston on or around June 29th 2012
Summary: Blue, red, white flashing rather large object hovering!
divs: Sighting DetailsIt first started on the 27th of July, I am intrested in UFO activity so I just happened to look out of my bedroom window is was about 11.10pm and there seemed to be no stars in the sky then all of a sudden I spotted one, as I looked at it I thought I saw a hint of blue in it so I got my telescope and focused in on as much as I could and it was blue, red, white green all sorts of colours it seemed to be quite a distance I couldn't make out a shape just extremely bright lights I watches it for about a hour and it seemed to move slowly to the right then up down but very slow, following night it was very cloudy but at about 12am there was a break in the cloud and it was in the exact same place! ... I watched for only a minute as the clouds came back over the following night I stood at the window looking at that spot and it wasn't there and I really wanted to show my partner I stop there for about 10 seconds looked back and it appeared out of nowhere looking bigger then the previous nights I looks through my telescope but I still couldn't make out a shape. My partner looked at it through the telescope and he couldn't understand it ... And then last night at around 11pm again low n behold it was there much closer this time but again still can't make a shape out.... I'm going to drive towards it tonight if it shows up see if I can get some footage!
